definition: to break the rules/to break discipline
in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
to break the law and violate discipline (idiom)

sentences.english: The employee has the right to appeal for higher-level leaders who breach the laws and regulations.
sentences.chinese: 對公司高層領導的違法亂紀行爲有投訴的權利。

sentences.english: The government sent lawbreakers into exile.
sentences.chinese: 政府對違法亂紀者實施流放。

sentences.english: They were not to get away with it if they continued to violate the law.
sentences.chinese: 如果他們繼續違法亂紀，將會受到法律的嚴懲。
